title: What Happened at the Christmas Parade in Waukesha, Wis.?
sub_head: Red SUV plowed into the holiday event, leaving 5 dead and more than 40 people injured
body:
A red SUV plowed through police barricades and into a local Christmas parade Sunday afternoon, killing five people and injuring more than 40, including children, the city said.
The parade started at 4 p.m. central time in this Milwaukee suburb, and the incident took place about 4:40 p.m., Waukesha Police Chief Daniel Thompson said. Police fired to try to stop the vehicle, which was why bystanders heard shots fired, the police chief said.
